paper_abstract: In this work we sketch how Paraconsistent Artificial Neural Network - PANN - can be useful in speech signals recognition by using phonic traces signals. The PANN is built based on Paraconsistent Annotated Logic E tau and it allows us to manipulate uncertain, inconsistent and paracomplete information without trivialization.
paper_title: Paraconsistent artificial neural network: Applicability in computer analysis of speech productions
